episodes.title: Mysterious Deaths, Fraud and Abuse: The Angel's Landing Cult and Daniel Perez, It's Leader
episodes.description:
Detective Ron Goodwyn was concerned when a mysterious man and his small group of cult followers moved into his area. Lou Castro was a man with no verifiable past. The more Ron Goodwyn looked into this group, the more he realized, something was not right. His investigation went nowhere because Lou Castro was not documented anywhere. That's because Lou Castro was not the leader's real name. It was Daniel Perez. When cult members begin dying in unusual and frequent accidents, Ron Goodwyn learns that they had had expensive life insurance policies and he begins to form an idea as to how Daniel Perez is funding his lavish lifestyle.

episodes.title: Under the Banner of Heaven: Mormonism and Murder
episodes.description: The Lafferty brothers were raised in a very bizarre home and as they grew, their Mormon beliefs became more and more extreme. When Ron and Dan Lafferty declare themselves to be prophets of God, they are excommunicated from the Mormon church and their wives divorce them. The two men decide that their sister in law, Brenda Wright Lafferty, was to blame for their divorces and they target her and the people responsible for their shunning by the Mormon church. What follows is a brutal double murder after a story of religious extremism and strange beliefs ❤️ Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu9SNFGpY_odhZT_LevkGvw 📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/darkheartswithstacylee?igsh=Z2d3bTJtZ2NsNXIy&utm_source=qr 🎵 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@darkheartswithstacylee?_t=8ns1oHffLyd&_r=1 💰 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/DarkHeartswithStacyLee?utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator 💵 CashApp: https://cash.app/$stacyleeDWD 🤑 Venmo: https://www.venmo.com/u/DarkHeartsWithStacyLee 📧 Email: darkheartswithstacylee@gmail.com

episodes.title: Abuse, torture and murder inside Chile's German run concentration camp, Colonia Dignidad
episodes.description:
This is one of the darkest cult stories I've ever covered. A former Nazi, Paul Schäfer cozies up to the Chilean dictator, Jorge Alessandri Rodriguez and together, they form a devious plan. Paul Schäfer is gifted a large plot of land and he begins moving his German cult followers to Chile. Soon, he has constructed a compound and people are no longer free to leave. Stories of abuse and child sexual abuse begin coming out of the cult but because of Schäfer's connections, nothing is done about it. A new dictator is put in place and things get much worse. Working with DINA in Chile, illegally held prisoners are kept at Colonia Dignidad and some are murdered. Over time, eleven hundred people go missing and are murdered at the cult compound. The families of cult members are demanding justice but it takes far too long for action.

episodes.title: One of the worst cult stories I've ever heard. Two sisters commit unthinkable acts of horror.
episodes.description:
One night a man is setting up a new baby monitor. What he sees on the screen, he cannot believe. His monitor is picking up the feed from a different monitor from his neighborhood. He calls the police and what they find is something out of a horror film. Klara Mauerova and Katerina Mauerova have Klara's son Ondrej locked in the basement, where he has been for months. Just when this story cannot get any stranger, it does. Klara is the adoptive mother to a girl named Annika, who she claims is thirteen years old and suffering from leukemia. Annika is not who she appears to be and when she escapes, the police go on a year long manhunt to find this imposter. The two women are aided by Hana Bosova, Jan Scria and Jan Turek and you will simply not believe what these monsters are involved in.

episodes.title: Breath Of Fire Cult: The rise and downfall of Katie Griggs, Guru Jagat
episodes.description: The myth about Kundalini Yoga is that it is an ancient practice. The religion was, in fact, made up by Yogi Bhajan, Harbhajan Singh Khalsa who was once respected and even honored at the White House. Then, women began coming forward with horrific stories of psychological, physical and sexual abuse. Katie Griggs, Kundalini Katie, Guru Jagat then becomes the face of the Millennial Girl Boss yoga movement. She has tried to become famous through many means and finally, she is. She becomes radicalized by QAnon theories and right wing conspiracies. She is single handedly responsible for a lot of the new age to right wing conspiracy pipeline phenomenon we have witnessed. Guru Jagat creates a clothing line called Robotic Disaster and begins making a lot of money selling clothing and crystals and tonics. Behind closed doors, she is a tyrant who verbally abuses her employees and refuses to pay them what is owed. She breaks her ankle in Germany and suddenly, her empire comes crashing down ❤️ Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu9SNFGpY_odhZT_LevkGvw 📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/darkheartswithstacylee?igsh=Z2d3bTJtZ2NsNXIy&utm_source=qr 🎵 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@darkheartswithstacylee?_t=8ns1oHffLyd&_r=1 💰 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/DarkHeartswithStacyLee?utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator 💵 CashApp: https://cash.app/$stacyleeDWD 🤑 Venmo: https://www.venmo.com/u/DarkHeartsWithStacyLee 📧 Email: darkheartswithstacylee@gmail.com

episodes.title: House of Yahweh Cult
episodes.description: Today we are talking about the dangerous and insidious Texas cult known as The House of Yahweh. A man named Buffalo Bill Hawkins and his brother JG change their names to Yisrayl and Yaaqob and state that they are The Two Witnesses prophesied in the Book of Revelations. They gather a small following and before long, as in all cults, everything gets dark. Children are horrifically abused. Women are treated like cattle. Fire and brimstone reign down from Yisrayll's pulpit and he begins making predictions about the end of the world. He steals money, he starves his followers, he abuses everyone involved and then the authorities get involved. Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/dark-hearts-with-stacy-lee-podcast/donations

episodes.title: Shocking allegations from inside America's biggest spiritual movement. Was Guru Jagat a liar?
episodes.description:
Today we are talking about the birth and growth of Kundalini Yoga in America, something that was first thought to be an ancient practice, now known to be totally fabricated by it's founder, Yogi Bhajan. After his death, a woman named Katie Griggs rose to take his place at the helm of this rich and powerful cult, owner of 3HO Corporation and all it's subsidiaries as well as the Ra Ma Institute. Katie claims to have had a very special relationship with Yogi Bhajan. Now it appears she never even met the man. Allegations come out in 2019 that forever changes the way the world will remember Yogi Bhajan. Guru Jagat, formerly Katie Griggs, denied the allegations and continued to build the massive corporation, spending money like there was a never ending supply. She fell down the hole of conspiracy theories, QAnon, Covid denial, and is largely responsible for the New Age to Right Wing pipeline phenomena we have witnessed. And then, suddenly, it was all over with.

episodes.title: Speedos, muscles, plastic surgery and....spirituality? Meet the kookiest cult yet..Buddhafield
episodes.description:
Today we are taking a deep dive into the insane world of Jaime Gomez who also called himself Michel, Andreas, The Teacher, The Master and Reyji. We talk about how the cult grew in Hollywood after Jaime failed to make it as an actor, and then moved to Austin where it built the One World Theater, now owned by Joe Rogan, to produce ballets. Jaime Gomez put his cult members through two years of practice for a ballet that was never seen by anyone. The members of this cult worshipped Jaime. They gave him massages all day. They cooked his meals. They bought his food. They paid his expenses. But then, when it got out that Jaime was having sex with the male members, and abusing others, it all started to fall apart. Then the documentary, Holy Hell came out and it was all downhill from there.

episodes.description:
Is the Diddy lawsuit the biggest scandal to hit Hollywood in decades? Will this be the end of Sean Combs' music empire? Uncover the shocking truth behind the Diddy scandal in this riveting episode of Dark Hearts with Stacy Lee!

Dive deep into the explosive allegations against Sean "Diddy" Combs, from Cassie Ventura's bombshell lawsuit to the multiple victims coming forward. We'll explore the dark underbelly of celebrity crime, examining the Hollywood scandals that have rocked the entertainment industry to its core.

Join host Stacy Lee as she guides you through this gripping true crime podcast. Today she uncovers the Diddy controversy 2023 and its far-reaching implications. From the $100 million judgment to the alleged Illuminati conspiracy, no stone is left unturned in this explosive investigation.

Whether you're a true crime enthusiast or just fascinated by celebrity downfalls, this episode of Dark Hearts will keep you on the edge of your seat. Don't miss out on one of the most shocking stories in recent Hollywood history!

episodes.title: Cult of Falun Gon
episodes.description: You've seen the posters advertising for Shen Yun Dance, a traveling Chinese dance troupe that comes to your town every so often. But did you know, Shen Yun is part of a very dangerous and insidious cult called Falun Gong? This cult deprives people of their freedom, their money, their personal possessions, and their individuality. It makes millions each year on the Shen Yun shows, the dancers in which are basically slaves. Falun Gong is also involved in a massive propaganda effort for the extreme right wing that includes the media outlet, The Epoch Times. Join me for this disturbing tale that reminds us, things that look beautiful from the outside are often hiding something very sinister inside. Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/dark-hearts-with-stacy-lee-podcast/donations Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy

episodes.title: Jesus wants you to have an AR-15! Bejeweled crowns, fancy robes & lots and lots of guns...for Jesus
episodes.description:
This is one of the wackiest cults I've ever covered. Sean Moon, (Hyung Jin Sean Moon) son of Sun Myung Moon, founder of the cult commonly known as The Moonies, has started his own cult and it's even crazier than The Moonies. Sean believes The Rod of Iron mentioned in the Bible is not the word of god, or a metaphor for holding fast to the rod in order to return to heaven. Sean believes The Rod of Iron mentioned in the Bible is an actual AR-15. This cult is not just obsessed with guns, it actually worships guns. The cult is dangerous and its members are unhinged. This cult is homophobic, misogynistic, transphobic and anti-Constitution. It's also ridiculous and hilarious...well at least it would be if it weren't so scary.

episodes.title: Knights of The Crystal Blade
episodes.description: Two Mormon Fundamentalist men with some very strange ideas take their children into the Southern Utah desert to wait out what they believe to be the coming apocalypse. Samuel Shaffer and John Alvin Coltharp take their children, two boys and four girls under the age of eight and hide them from the law and their mothers. When the cops finally catch up to them, they almost cannot believe the stories the children have to tell but they must because they are all true. The level of abuse is unthinkable and the level of delusion is disturbing. What leads to this kind of paranoia and mental instability? My opinion might surprise you. Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/dark-hearts-with-stacy-lee-podcast/donations Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy

episodes.title: The Amish Serial Killer
episodes.description: A little boy is found frozen and wrapped in a blue blanket on the side of a rural Nebraska road on Christmas Eve. For years, his identity is unknown. And then, as men begin turning up murdered first in Colorado and then in Texas, the police connect their killer to the little boy's father. Eli Stutzman left the Amish community behind him and walked into a world of drugs, alcohol and murder. episodes.title: Why I left the Mormon Church? (Almost got killed)
episodes.description:
Why I left the Mormon Church? 

What dark secrets lie beneath its seemingly perfect facade? How does one find freedom after years of indoctrination? Uncover the answers to these questions in today's raw and emotional episode of Dark Hearts with Stacy Lee!

In this deeply personal story, I share my Mormon Church exit story. I share my experiences growing up in Utah Mormon culture and the challenges I faced in my faith journey. From confronting controversial Mormon doctrines to healing from religious trauma, this episode explores the complexities of life after Mormonism.

Join me, Stacy Lee, as I guide you through my transformation from devout Mormon to finding freedom beyond religion. We'll examine the Mormon Church's stance on social issues, the impact of religious indoctrination, and the path to healing after leaving a high-demand faith. Whether you're questioning your beliefs or interested in understanding religious trauma, this episode of Dark Hearts will resonate deeply.

Subscribe to "Dark Hearts with Stacy Lee" on Apple Podcasts and Spotify to stay updated on more personal stories and investigations. Follow Stacy on TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook for additional content. Support the podcast by checking out the fundraiser video on Stacy's channel. episodes.title: The Trad Wife Controversy *Podcast Exclusive*
episodes.description: *Podcast Exclusive* Today we are discussing the rising phenomenon of "trad wives" which is slang or traditional wife; a woman who stays home, takes a back seat to her husband, cooks for him, cleans for him, and has lots of babies. We talk about Nara Smith and other trad wife content creators and then we discuss a very recent controversy involving Hannah Neeleman who is known on social media as Ballerina Farm. What is this new "trad wife" movement and how is this antifeminist sentiment affecting women not only in America but around the world? episodes.title: Trad Wives: from Hannah Neeleman to Tom Green & FLDS - Inside Mormon and polygamist cults
episodes.description:
The controversial world of Mormons and polygamy collide in this explosive episode of the best true crime podcast you can't miss! Is there a connection between billionaire David Neeleman's son and the FLDS? Is Hannah Neeleman, wife of JetBlue founder David Neeleman, secretly involved in a modern-day Mormon cult? As we peel back the layers of these religious cults, we ask: Are these true crime stories more than they appear? 

From the infamous Tom Green polygamist to the hidden compounds of polygamist groups, we journey through the dark underbelly of Mormonism and its offshoots. Famous cult leaders, secret ceremonies, and the struggle against oppressive traditions – it's all here in this gripping episode. With insider knowledge from Stacy's own Mormon upbringing, this episode delves deep into conspiracy theories surrounding these secretive communities. Join host Stacy Lee as she navigates the treacherous waters of Mormon cults and uncovers the Hannah Neeleman drama that's set the internet ablaze. Is there more to this conspiracy theory than meets the eye? Tune in to find out!

Subscribe to support the podcast and stay tuned for more spine-chilling episodes! Follow Stacy on TT, IG, and FB, and check out her podcasts on Apple and Spotify - Dining With Death and Dark Hearts. Thank you for your continued support! ❤️🖤

Taylor Frankie Paul and her then husband Tate have a large group of friends in Draper, Utah. Taylor starts posting some very strange videos on social media that make people wonder just what is going on between these friends. Then, the group admits, they are swinging but claim to be "soft swingers."
We talk about the very bizarre current culture at BYU involving soaking and other...ahem...loopholes and how this plays into Mormons who are having a hard time finding their place and following the rules in side Mormonism. 
So many of you have requested to hear more about Mormonism and this all plays into the larger conversation as to why we are seeing so many Mormons involved in serious and strange crimes as of late.

We discuss Yisroel Hawkins and the cult he started called The House of Yahweh. Yisrayl was born Buffalo Bill Hawkins but soon changed his name after failing at everything he tried and then finding God. He and his brother JG, who changed his name to Yaqoob claim to the The Two Witnesses from the Book of Revelations. 

Yisrayl began claiming he could predict future events and when the Waco standoff and the Heaven's Gate events occurred, he stated he foresaw those events. Then he begins predicting the end of the world, over and over. Soon people around the cult's compound begin to notice some very disturbing things and then the authorities get involved.
Join me for this very bizarre story of bigamy, illegal contact with minor females and forced child labor as we discuss why it's so important to keep an eye on these extremists.

Now, Tim has been denounced by the Mormon church, and is embroiled in scandal as woman after woman comes forward accusing Tim of sexually assaulting him as they worked for him. His attorney is also in hot water and the funding behind his movie, Sound of Freedom has also been arrested.

episodes.title: Racism, Bigotry and Child Abuse: The Twelve Tribes Cult and the Yellow Deli restaurant that funds it
episodes.description:
We're back at it today with those crazy cultsters! Today we are talking about The Twelve Tribes, which runs a restaurant chain called The Yellow Deli. We discuss the history of the cult, which started out as The Light Brigade and then became The Vine Community Church before finally changing its name to The Twelve Tribes. We discuss it's founders, Gene and Marsha Spriggs, and the allegations against the cult: child abuse, psychological abuse, labor law violations and physical abuse. We talk about the cult migration from Chattanooga, Tennessee to Vermont and then back to Chattanooga and we talk about the Yellow Deli history and current status. These are my opinions and thoughts. This is not a news channel, friends. If you're pro-cult, I'd suggest skipping this video.

I give you the details of the story and bring you up to date as we wait for more details.

episodes.title: The Ant Hill Kids: A horrific story of brainwashing and abuse inside an insidious cult
episodes.description:
We discuss the disturbing case of Roch Thériault, also known as Moise, Moses and Rock, who started a small cult after being excommunicated from the Seventh Day Adventist Church. We talk about the escalating abuse that happened inside the cult, including castrations, starvation and unnecessary surgery and how a social worker, Paula Jackson, helped bring attention to what was happening. We trace the cult's path through Canada into Ontario and we talk about Roch's ever changing and increasingly disturbing beliefs regarding sex, anatomy, health and the apocalypse. The cult, which came to be known as The Ant Hill Kids, was eventually disbanded after many years of hard work and we discuss what eventually happened to it's sick and twisted leader, Roch Thériault and the film that was made about these events, Savage Messiah.

episodes.description:
We discuss the very little known case of David Immanuel, originally Bruce Longo, who, after joining the Mormon Church, decided he was God, Jesus and The Holy Ghost. We talk about how he and his small group of followers banded together in their apocalyptic beliefs and what ultimately became of them. David Immanuel took the easy way out, leaving his wife Rachel to raise their seven children. When she decided she could not do that, she forced them off of the roof of the Shilo Inn in Salt Lake City Utah. Some of the older children jumped to their deaths. This group is sometimes called The Cult of David Immanuel or The Cult of David.

We discuss the shocking and terrible crimes committed by members of the Italian cult that called themselves Beasts of Satan. Andrea Volpe, Nicola Sapone and others, along with Elisabetta Ballarin eventually lead authorities to the bodies of their victims but are they being completely truthful? Some believe there are many more victims.

This is a bit different from my regular post. I am bringing to you, information I uncovered on social media and a story I have been collaborating on with a journalist. episodes.title: Under the Banner of Heaven: The Lafferty Brothers cult and the murder of Brenda and Erica Lafferty
episodes.description:
We discuss the story of Ron and Dan Lafferty, two brothers who decided they were prophets of God and started The School of Prophets. They branched off of mainstream mormonism, using the Book of Mormon doctrine of blood atonement, and started their own cult. We review the timeline of events and the circumstances surrounding the murder of Brenda Wright Lafferty and her child as well as the plot to kill Richard Stowe and Chloe Low. We discuss the arrests, the theories, and the aftermath.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell Story: the murders, children, cult, arrest, Mormonism, and update.
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell are accused and arrested for murder. We provide an update version of the events including their cult beliefs. We discuss a clear timeline of events, the disappearance of Lori Vallow's kids, and the discovery of their remains. We discuss Chad Daybell's apocalyptic style books based in Mormonism. We review the many people who have died surrounding this case and what is known to this date.
